result.title: Cow Curling
result.content:
Hi,

Recently I make this submission to problem Cow Curling, but I get WA on all tests except 1 and 10. My algorithm is to construct the convex hull of both sets of points. Now, I do a binary search on the segments of the convex hull to tell if a point is in the convex hull or not. However, I think something is wrong with implementation; can anyone help me locate bug? BTW; I try this code with and without epsilon, and it still doesn't work.

Regards â€” memset123
